Text: Hey how do you get this to play full screen?
when you enter the game it appears a window with configuration. Choose full screen.

I've been having the same issue with full screen. It doesn't matter if that box is checked or not it still plays in a window. 

Not that I'm complaining over a free game like. :P
try alt+enter. For me it works good.
If you`ve got Win 7 64-bit, run the launcher as administrator to run the game properly. Then the full screen problem disappears, as well as other problems.
Haha, setting the launcher to open as admin worked (Windows 7, not 64bit). Thanks for that man. :)

Still not working for me
win7 64 bits
i get the has stopped working message
plz help
It gives me the error "AppId is not configured".
